name: Giampa & Tuc and the hunt for the forever lost comics (unless they find them)
name_original: Giampa & Tuc and the hunt for the forever lost comics (unless they find them)
description:
A new Run & Click adventure game, in comic-style art, with comics to find and read!

Help Giampa and Tuc to find the lost limited-edition comics collection. 

Try the free demo (feel free to make a donation to support the developer).
Costructive critics and comments are welcome (maybe also bugs report XD).

There are ITALIAN and ENGLISH subtitles.
The italian version is perfect! (tztz).
The english version has some (a lot) errors, but it's Google Translate fault, not mine! 

Mac version has not been tested, I don't have a Mac, sorry.

And if you know a cool publisher, write in the comments, thanks.
